category: Sports Fair Committee Regulations/Article 17 (Subject of Deliberation)
contents: Article 17 (Objects of Deliberation) Pursuant to Article 43, Paragraph 1, Item 4 of the Articles of Incorporation, the Committee deliberates and decides on the deliberation of executives on the following items. 1. Korean Sports Council executives 2. Executives and presidential candidates of member sports organizations, executives of member city/provincial sports associations (exceptions are made in cases where public officials are officers) and presidential candidates 3. Executives of city/provincial sports organizations of member city/provincial sports associations Persons subject to reconsideration of executive deliberation: Revised on January 24, 2022
